* Contact: AlexandreKraft
* Make : Acer
* Model: Travel``Mate 525TEV (520 Series)
* Website: http://www.acersupport.com/notebook/html/tm520.html

=== Current Issues ===
CPU frequency scaling doesn't work.
Hibernation doesn't resume properly (crashes at usplash on startup).
Some keys are not recognized correctly.
